articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Football School, Sports Park
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Football School, Sports Park
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, went round Pyongyang International Football School and the Rungna People's Sports Park.
					 He first went to the newly built Pyongyang International Football School.
					
					 Making the round of classroom, bedroom, bathhouse, mess hall and other places of the school, he learned in detail about its construction, management and operation.
					
					 There is nothing to spare for reserve footballers who will be trained at this school to display the honor of the country at international games in the future, he said, underlining the need to do supply service well.
					
					 After acquainting himself with the cooling and heating of the school building, he noted that effective use of geothermal energy will help decrease electricity consumption and provide students with better living conditions.
					
					 He instructed the school officials to steadily improve the education contents and methods and properly manage and operate the school as required by the changing situation and thus bring up more promising reserve footballers.
					
					 He then toured the newly built Rungna People's Sports Park.
					
					 Making the round of different places of the park, he learned about its construction and plan for its management and operation.
					
					 He underscored the need to take good care of sports facilities and equipment that were set up in the park and properly organize public services.
					
					 A restaurant should be built well so that it may be used by the people as the park is a place where they have a rest, he said.
					
					 At the place for borrowing sports apparatuses he examined roller skates to be used by schoolchildren and people. He said that in order to develop mass sports and sports technique, it is necessary to meticulously approach the work of fully providing necessary apparatuses.
					
					 Learning about greenery in the park, he told officials to arrange surrounding environment well by planting trees of good species.
					
					 He also went round the office, conference room and other places of the remodeled building of the Secretariat of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Committee, giving precious teachings on developing the country's sports.
					
					 He said that the committee should establish public atmosphere for sports, put sports science and technology on a world level and ensure better material supply for the training of reserve players and development of the sports field.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Ri Yong Su and Pak Chun Hong.

articles.title: North and South Held Working-level Contact
articles.content:
North and South Held Working-level Contact
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Working-level contact for the talks between authorities of the north and the south of Korea was made at Panmunjom Sunday and Monday.
					 At the contact both sides discussed working issues arising in opening the talks between authorities of the north and the south and adopted a press release.
					
					 According to the press release, it was decided to open the talks in Seoul on June 12 to run through June 13, 2013 and call them the talks between authorities of the north and the south.
					
					 It was agreed to discuss immediate and urgent matters concerning the inter-Korean relations including the issue of normalizing the operation of the Kaesong Industrial Zone, the issue of resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang, the issue of reunion of separated families and their relatives and other humanitarian issues, the issue of jointly marking the June 15 and July 4 anniversaries and the issue of promoting non-governmental visits, contacts and cooperation projects.
					
					 It was decided that each delegation to the talks would comprise five delegates, the delegation of the north side would be headed by minister-level authorities and the delegation of the north side would travel to the south overland on the west coast.
					
					 It was decided to discuss additional working matters through Panmunjom hotline.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Portuguese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Portuguese President
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Anibal Cavaco Silva, president of the Portuguese Republic, Monday on its national day.
					 The message wished the president and people of Portugal success in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Makes Field Survey of Sepho Tableland
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Makes Field Survey of Sepho Tableland
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a field survey of the Sepho Tableland.
					 Kim inspired the service personnel and shock brigade members who perform feats day after day in the same spirit as displayed in winding up the sowing of grass seeds in the reclaimed tableland covering thousands of hectares in the right time of spring.
					
					 He met officials concerned to learn about the reclamation of the tableland. He said that the achievements made at the projects are the shining product of patriotism and loyalty displayed by service personnel and people of the DPRK inheriting the fighting spirit of the preceding generations who performed heroic feats in the history of the country in hearty response to the call of the party and the leader.
					
					 He told officials that nothing is impossible if everybody works hard in the spirit of devotedly carrying out the party's policies and the spirit of "at a go", bearing deep in mind the noble intention of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed belief that all the builders of the tableland would bring about a leap forward and innovations in every construction site like the soldier-builders who  created the "Masikryong Speed" and thus live up to the deep trust and expectation of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Tablet Autographed by Kim Jong Un Unveiled
articles.content:
Tablet Autographed by Kim Jong Un Unveiled
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A tablet autographed by Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was unveiled at the Taesongsan General Hospital.
					 He sent the tablet bearing his autograph to the hospital after wisely leading the work to complete its construction at the best level and open it as early as possible as instructed by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Right after the liberation of Korea, Generalissimo Kim Il Sung had a hospital for soldiers built and clearly indicated the way to be followed by it. True to his noble intention, Kim Jong Il initiated the building of the Taesongsan General Hospital and worked heart and soul for its completion.
					
					 An unveiling ceremony of tablet "Taesongsan General Hospital" autographed by Kim Jong Un, was held on Monday.
					
					 Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, in his speech said that the medical officers and nurses of the hospital should devotedly save lives of service personnel, bearing deep in mind the autograph of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants watched the tablet, being briefed on it.

articles.title: Memorial Stamps off Press in DPRK
articles.content:
Memorial Stamps off Press in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently issued a sheetlet carrying pictures of leader Kim Jong Il meetings with Chinese leaders.
					 Seen in the upper part of the sheetlet are Korean letters reading "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il meets state leaders of China."
					
					 The stamps carry pictures of Kim Jong Il meeting with Jiang Zemin and Hu Jintao. 
					
					 Other stamps feature the national flags of the two countries and Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang and Tiananmen Square in Beijing.

articles.title: New Dictionary Published in DPRK
articles.content:
New Dictionary Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The Korea Publications Export and Import Corporation has brought out a Korean language-related dictionary.
					 Arranged in an alphabetical order, the dictionary contains more than 25,000 vocabularies, with their compounds, synonyms, antonyms and contrasts totaling over 1,500,000.
					
					 It also carries aphorisms of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and respected Marshal Kim Jong Un as well as idioms and proverbs after related synonyms and antonyms.
					
					 All the vocabularies are arranged together with English versions.
					
					 The dictionary serves as a big stride forward in the nation's linguistic development.
					
					 People's Scientist Min Yong Hwa, a researcher of Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies who authored the dictionary, told KCNA that it would be useful in selecting appropriate vocabularies and expressions.

articles.title: Wax Replicas of Koguryo Warriors Displayed at Folklore Park
articles.content:
Wax Replicas of Koguryo Warriors Displayed at Folklore Park
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Wax replicas of warriors in the period of Koguryo Kingdom (277 B.C.-668 A.D) have been recently displayed at the entrance of a Koguryo government office building in the Pyongyang Folklore Park.
					 The sturdy appearances of a chief sentry and a sentry in armor with a sword and a spear handle respectively in their hands, represented in the wax replicas, give a glimpse of the militaristic spirit of the Koguryo people.
					
					 When visiting the folklore park in September last year, Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, dropped in at the building and suggested setting up the replicas there to give visitors a better understanding of Koguryo Kingdom.
					
					 In response to his suggestion, the Mansudae Art Studio splendidly created the replicas on the basis of the principle of historicism.

articles.title: US Can Not Evade Responsibility for Igniting War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
US Can Not Evade Responsibility for Igniting War: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- With no trick can the U.S. imperialists evade all responsibilities for igniting the Korean War, says Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article on Monday.
					 It says:
					
					 The Korean War was one of injustice provoked by the U.S. to invade the young DPRK, and it was a disgraceful war for the U.S. as its myth of "mightiness" was shattered to pieces. So the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime have nothing to commemorate as regards June 25 (the day when the Korean War was unleashed by the U.S. imperialists).
					
					 The reason that the provokers of the war hold such an event as "commemoration" of the day every year is to cover up its true colors, and to make the world convince that the DPRK is "a criminal" who provoked the war.
					
					 Such an event also aims to push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the acute phase under the pretext of the "north's threat to invade the south" in order to redress the defeat in the past war at any cost and unleash the second Korean War without fail.
					
					 The U.S. installment of "the commemorative things" related to the war will only reveal its history of defeat in the war.
					
					 War maniacs would be well advised to draw a lesson from the ends of the U.S. commanders in the war.
					
					 If the U.S. war-like forces again unleash a war in Korea, they will meet a fate more miserable than what was met by war maniacs in the past Korean War.

articles.title: May Issue of Magazine Thongil Published
articles.content:
May Issue of Magazine Thongil Published
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans published the May issue of Thongil, a monthly social and political magazine.
					 The magazine featured photos of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un inspecting Unit 405 of the Korean People's Army and the news of his inspection.
					
					 It conveyed news that he provided field guidance to the Combined Foodstuff-processing Factory under KPA Unit 534 and the supply base on the east coast under KPA Unit 639.
					
					 It gave much space to the news that he visited the Ministry of People's Security on May Day to congratulate the people's security persons and service personnel of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF). It also carried the news that he, inspecting Unit 2219 of the KPISF, underlined the need to resolutely foil the moves of the enemy forces to stifle the DPRK and devotedly defend the party, social system and people.
					
					 It dealt with the news that the director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA visited China as his special envoy.
					
					 It carried the answer given by a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK to the question raised by KCNA as regards the fact that the U.S. malignantly defamed the DPRK in its "annual report on the international freedom of religion" and the account of the interview a reporter of Interfax of Russia had with the DPRK ambassador to Russia in which the ambassador termed the U.S. the arch criminal escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula recently.
					
					 It also noted that various personages of Russia issued articles stressing that the DPRK took toughest countermeasures against the U.S. to defend its sovereignty and won a victory in the showdown with the latter.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Hungary
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Hungary
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was inaugurated in Hungary on June 4 to commemorate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the undying feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu in the period from June 4 to July 31.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Organization Hails Inter-Korean Declaration
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Organization Hails Inter-Korean Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy issued bulletin titled "June 15 for reunification" on June 2 on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 There adopted the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration in Pyongyang in June 2000, which calls for achieving prosperity common to the nation and reunification of the country in an independent and peaceful way, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself."
					
					 Thanks to the adoption of the joint declaration the north and the south of Korea could orientate their work to reconciliation, unity and reunification based on common nationality and blood by overcoming different ideas and social systems and beyond confrontation and mistrust.
					
					 Dialogues and negotiations took place in various aspects between the north and the south of Korea after the adoption of the joint declaration.
					
					 Joint agreements were reached there from the stand of giving priority to the desire and interests of the fellow countrymen, promoting national unity, reunification, cooperation and exchange and bearing fruition oriented toward national reunification.
					
					 However, the south Korean conservative group totally negated the joint declaration right after it took power.
					
					 The group is working hard to prevent the inter-Korean cooperation projects, valuable fruition in the June 15 era of reunification, from being implemented and escalate confrontation on the Korean Peninsula by hatching plots in succession.
					
					 Affirmation of the June 15 joint declaration precisely means reunification but negation of it a war. This has become the truth recognized not only by the Korean people but the world people.
					
					 The Korean nation will surely build a reunified thriving nation under the uplifted banner of the joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Escuela Internacional de Futbol y Parque Deportivo del Pueblo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Escuela Internacional de Futbol y Parque Deportivo del Pueblo
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Escuela Internacional de Futbol de Pyongyang y el Parque Deportivo del Pueblo de Rungna. 
					Estuvo primero en la Escuela Internacional de Futbol de Pyongyang. 
					
					Pasando revista a las aulas, dormitorios, bano, comedor y otros lugares, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de construccion y gestion. 
					
					En esta escuela se formaran los futbolistas de reserva que exaltaran el honor de la patria en las competencias internacionales, dijo y agrego que no hay nada que escatimar para ellos resaltando la necesidad de mejorar el abastecimiento. 
					
					Cerciorado de las condiciones de refrigeracion y calefaccion, enseno que hace falta utilizar con eficiencia la geotermia para reducir el consumo de electricidad y facilitar mas comodidades de vida a los alumnos. 
					
					Es necesario mejorar incesantemente los contenidos y metodos didacticos conforme a la demanda de la realidad en desarrollo y operar bien la escuela para formar mucho mas reservas prometedoras de futbol, indico. 
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal recorrio el Parque Deportivo del Pueblo de Rungna. 
					
					Dando vuelta por varios lugares, averiguo la calidad de construccion y el plan de mantenimiento y operacion. 
					
					En este parque recien construido, deben cuidar bien las instalaciones y equipos deportivos y organizar bien los servicios, dijo. 
					
					Hace falta construir bien un restaurante para los trabajadores que vendran aqui a tomar descanso, instruyo.
					
					En la sala de prestacion de aparatos deportivos, vio los patines de ruedas a ser usados por los jovenes, ninos y trabajadores y dijo que para desarrollar los deportes masivos y la tecnica deportiva, hay que proveer suficientemente de los implementos necesarios. 
					
					Informado del estado de reforestacion del parque deportivo, instruyo plantar los arboles de buenas especies y arreglar mejor el medioambiente periferico. 
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal recorrio las oficinas, la sala de reunion y otros lugares del edificio del Secretariado del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, recien reconstruido, dando valiosas instrucciones para desarrollar los deportes nacionales. 
					
					Apunto que el Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes debe establecer el ambiente social sobre el deporte, elevar al nivel mundial la ciencia y tecnica de la rama y suministrar bien los materiales necesarios para la formacion de los deportistas de reserva y otras labores. 
					
					En esta ocasion, el fue acompanado por Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Song Thaek, Ri Yong Su y Pak Chun Hong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia regalos a participantes en VII Congreso de la ONC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia regalos a participantes en VII Congreso de la ONC
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio presentes a los participantes en el VII Congreso de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea (ONC).
					Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la ceremonia de entrega con la participacion de los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung y los delegados de la ONC.
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la UJS Jon Yong Nam dijo en su discurso de la ocasion que en los regalos estan impregnados el amor paternal y gran confianza del Mariscal quien les desea a los miembros de la ONC crecer como competentes revolucionarios y pilares de la Corea prospera con ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud.
					
					Subrayo que con el orgullo y dignidad de ser miembros de la Organizacion de Ninos de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, todos los integrantes de la ONC deben cumplir el juramento tomado ante la bandera de su organizacion para formarse como fidedignos sucesores de la revolucion del Songun, infinitamente fieles al Mariscal.

articles.title: Efectuado contacto de trabajo con vistas a conversaciones de autoridades N-S
articles.content:
Efectuado contacto de trabajo con vistas a conversaciones de autoridades N-S
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 9 al 10 en Phanmunjom el contacto de trabajo para las conversaciones entre las autoridades del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					En la ocasion, ambas partes debatieron los asuntos practicos que se presentan en la apertura de las conversaciones de las autoridades intercoreanas y aprobaron un comunicado.
					
					Segun el documento, esas platicas se realizaran del 12 al 13 de junio de 2013 en Seul con el nombre oficial de conversaciones de las autoridades Norte-Sur.
					
					En su agenda se incluyen el asunto de normalizacion de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong, el de la reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang, los temas humanitarios inclusive el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados, la celebracion conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 4 de Julio, fechas de publicacion de declaraciones intercoreanas, el viaje y contacto a nivel civil, el desarrollo de los proyectos de cooperacion y otras prioridades de las relaciones N-S.
					
					La delegacion de cada parte sera de 5 miembros y una autoridad de nivel de ministro presidira la delegacion del Norte que tendra como su ruta de ida y vuelta la via terrestre de la costa occidental del pais.
					
					Se acordo debatir los adicionales problemas de trabajo a traves del canal de comunicacion en Phanmunjom.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recorre campo de esqui de desfiladero Masik
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recorre campo de esqui de desfiladero Masik
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, recorrio el lugar de construccion del campo de esqui del desfiladero Masik.
					El lugar estaba lleno de las indoblegables fuerzas espirituales y el temperamento de  tesonera ofensiva de los constructores militares quienes en acato al historico llamamiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, crean la nueva velocidad de ataque de siglo 21, la "Velocidad Masikryong".
					
					En la cima del campo de esqui, Kim contemplo las pistas de esqui y expreso profunda emocion ante el hecho de que los constructores militares terminaron apenas en un ano la gigantesca obra haciendo gala del coraje revolucionario y el impetu de los militares.
					
					Subrayo que son inconmovibles la decision y la voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de ofrecer las condiciones de una vida mas culta y feliz a los habitantes, los jovenes y ninos al construir en la zona del desfiladero Masik el campo de esqui de talla mundial.
					
					Enfatizo que el campo de esqui es una obra de construccion estimado por el PTC como objeto importante y agrego que el EPC debe tomar siempre la delantera en registrar el gran auge en la construccion de una nueva epoca de la revolucion del Songun en acato al grandioso proposito del Mariscal de construir un pais socialista civilizado.
					
					Dijo que aunque son enormes las tareas de la obra y habra muchas dificultades, todos los constructores militares deben poner de pleno manifiesto el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il con la ofensiva general en terminarlas sin falta en el presente ano.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recorre campo de roturacion de meseta de Sepho
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recorre campo de roturacion de meseta de Sepho
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hizo en el terreno conocimiento del campo de roturacion de la meseta de Sepho.
					El visitante estimulo a los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los brigadistas quienes crean meritos cada dia tras terminar a tiempo la siembra primaveral en miles de hectareas de pastizales nuevamente roturados.
					
					Se reunio con los funcionarios correspondientes para hacer conocimiento de la roturacion y dijo que los exitos alcanzados en los campos de construccion son orgulloso fruto de la fidelidad patriotica del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que continuan el espiritu de lucha de las generaciones anteriores que registraron meritos heroicos en los anales de la patria en pleno acato al llamamiento del partido y el lider. 
					
					de la RPDC quienes responden no con palabras sino con acciones al llamamiento del partido y el lider, la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					Apunto a los funcionarios que nada es imposible cuando todos luchen con el espiritu de materializar a ultranza la politica del partido y el de ataque de un tiron teniendo presente el noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Los roturadores deben levantar por doquier la ola de saltos e innovaciones como los constructores militares, que van creando la "Velocidad Masikryong", y recompensar asi la gran confianza y esperanza del Mariscal, resalto.
